credit_line: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
title: Powder Box with Accordion Player
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Cylindrical in shape, straight sides; the figures of a male accordion player and a woman seated sculpted on top of lid; painted in polychrome enamels, gilded bands around upper and lower edges of base and lid.
name: Box and cover
